languages.text: When the Warrior {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, their next Warrior {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
languages.original_text: Когда воин {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} атаку, следующее применение {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} его {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетипа{/g} требует на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше.

traits.locale_text: When the Fighter parries an attack, their next Fighter {g|Encyclopedia:Career}doctrine{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.

languages.text: ファイターが攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流す{/g}と、次のファイターの{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}は消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} −1で{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用できる。

languages.text: Cuando el guerrero {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pare{/g} un ataque, su próxima {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} de guerrero cuesta −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} menos.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el guerrero {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pare{/g} un ataque, su próxima {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} de guerrero cuesta −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} menos.
